values: Q&A with Piper, Mason, Driscoll, Greear, and StetzerQ&A with Piper, Mason, Driscoll, Greear, and Stetzer

Revivals cannot be manufactured by human strategies, but we can seek the things that have characterized them throughout history: prayer, repentance, and the proclamation of the gospel.Revivals cannot be manufactured by human strategies, but we can seek the things that have characterized them throughout history: prayer, repentance, and the proclamation of the gospel.
